titles.title: Multinational Species Conservation Funds Reauthorization Act of 2011
To reauthorize the African Elephant Conservation Act, the Rhinoceros and Tiger Conservation Act of 1994, and the Asian Elephant Conservation Act of 1997.
Multinational Species Conservation Funds Reauthorization Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

bill.summary: Multinational Species Conservation Funds Reauthorization Act of 2011 - Authorizes appropriations to carry out the African Elephant Conservation Act, the Rhinoceros and Tiger Conservation Act of 1994, and the Asian Elephant Conservation Act of 1997 for FY2012-FY2016.
